strapiPost.title: Mercy Plans $500M Expansion In NWA
strapiPost.content:
Mercy recently announced it would invest $500 million to expand in Northwest Arkansas. 

  • What's coming: This next phase of growth will include a state-of-the-art cancer center, emergency department and isolation room expansion, additional clinic locations, more outpatient care facilities, and nearly double the current number of primary care physicians and specialists. 
  • Keeping pace: The $500 million investment brings Mercy's total commitment to NWA to almost $1 billion in less than a decade. As NWA is such a fast-growing metro, Mercy's continued growth is critical to meeting the community's needs.
